column3:
When moving/renaming, we should also change the header guards to match the new directory names:

block.h:#ifndef BITCOIN_CORE_BLOCK_H
transaction.h:#ifndef BITCOIN_CORE_TRANSACTION_H

ACK.

Agree on changing the header guards.
Although I'm getting kind of lost in the move-stuff-around commits, I agree primitives is a better name.\n

What I'd personally like to see this directory (whatever it's called) evolve to is: basic data structures and their serializations. That means probably that CScript, serialize.h, maybe amount.h, ... also belong here.\n
ACK - verified move only using `git diff -M HEAD~1`\n
